member.name: T:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler
member.summary: Profiler for the Tester Subsystem (integration tests for the checking of correctness of the injections in the model assembly)

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler.RegisterStatic(System.String)
member.summary: Registers the probe data from the injected Target app

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler.Register(System.String)
member.summary: Registers the probe data from the injected Target app

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler.GetPoints(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the probe cross-points of Target by Test Context, function signature, etc.
member.param: Name of the assembly of function.
if set to true the probe data after its retrieving will be deleted.

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler.GetPointsIgnoringContext(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all cross-points ignoring execution context.

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler.GetMethods(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Gets list of the functions by current execution and logical contexts.
member.param: If set to true create not existed branch for the current execution or logical context.
Test context. If empty will try get current context

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterProfiler.GetBusinessMethodName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the business name of the tested method.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the repository for the Tester subsystem.

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterRepository.GetTargetsDir(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the concrete targets dir by calling assembly directory.
member.exception: Base directory for tests is empty. See {CoreConstants.CONFIG_TESTS_NAME}

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Agent.Testing.TesterRepository.FindTestsDir(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the root directory of the tests by some inner directory into it.
